author: MiniWarGaming
description:
An Apostate Cardinal has turned the population away from the Light of the Imperium. The Sisters of Battle advance on the Traitors looking to excise the rot from the foundation of the planet with Holy Flame.

In collaboration with Skari from Skaredcast - http://patreon.com/skaredcast

Members to watch the Post Game Show, go here
Youtube Members - https://youtu.be/Mk3aodZt6kk
Vault Members - https://www.miniwargaming.com/content/witch-hunters-vs-imperial-guard-adversaries-city-fight-warhammer-40k-4th-edition-post-game-show

Members to watch the Black Templars vs Emperors Children Battle Report, go here
Youtube Members - https://youtu.be/b_HXHlD-eJM
Vault Members - https://www.miniwargaming.com/content/patrol-clash-of-block-678-combat-patrol-in-4th-black-templars-vs-emperors-children-warhammer-40k

Terrain and mat for this game from the following:
The Ruins of Perdition - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/idemogames/the-ruins-of-perdition?ref=7tv125
Kraken Wargaming - https://krakenwa
title: The Apostate Must Fall - CityFight - Witch Hunters vs Imperial Guard Adversaries 4th Ed 40k Batrep
